sentence: A Miami-based attorney has filed a lawsuit on behalf of several central Florida residents against Florida Governor Ron DeSantis and others seeking to overturn the elimination of Disney's Reedy Creek Improvement District.
author: Fatma Khaled
title: Who is William Sanchez? Senate Candidate Sues DeSantis Over Disney District
